name: tm40
effect: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Defense Curl Gen I: Skull Bash)

flavor_text.black_white: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.
